title: Holistic market insights activation: formulating and delivering a unique value proposition in the world of market intelligence
abstract: The shift in demand for market research service and the change in the nature of consumer behavior signal that research firms should be prepared to adapt themselves in order to meet the new demands. Traditional firms that refuse to change risk of being irrelevant in the industry. On the other hand this change also brings opportunity for firms who are willing to adapt and are ready to face that change. The challenge for market research agencies is to find out how they should grab the opportunity while mitigating the risk that I associated with this change The main objective of this research is to devise a new business model with a unique value proposition for ADK-Insights so that it can develop a sustainable market growth in the long term.
source: Undegraduate Thesis No. 34010223/MAN/2015; Andre Kristianto Tjahyana (34411012)
